content:
Hideout 电音节在Pag岛的克罗地亚Zrce举行。首次举行于2011年，并入选 《卫报》 2011年评选的最佳欧洲节日之列，从那时起，年年火爆，门票很快售罄。该活动分为白天的泳池派对和夜间的表演。两者均在沿海滩的Zrce露天场所举行。从诺瓦利亚港口驶向亚得里亚海还有许多乘船聚会。2016年，Hideout Festival于6月26日星期日至6月30日星期四举行。这是英国广播公司第一电台第一年与活动合作，由Heidi，Monki和B Traits主持的现场泳池派对活动进行了3小时的广播。2017年的Hideout电音节于2017年6月26日至6月30日星期五举行。5个昼夜，包括MK和Hannah Wants在内的150多名艺术家。

 

参与过的嘉宾包括Seth Troxler，Nina Kraviz，SBTRKT，Ricardo Villalobos，Annie Mac，Skrillex，Four Tet，Andy C，Jamie Jones，DJ EZ，Pendulum，Modeselektor，Disclosure，Rudimental，Solumun，Sasha，Derrick Carter，Gorgon City，2016年，Hideout扩大了范围，包括Grime艺术家，例如Skepta，Preditah和Stormzy。

 

2019年音乐节时间为7月1日至5日，阵容包括MK, Patrick Topping, Camelphat, Alan Fitzpatrick和Sonny Fodera。
contentEn:
Hideout Festival is an annual electronic music festival held in Zrce, Croatia on the island of Pag. The first festival was in 2011, and landed on The Guardian's list of the best European festivals of 2011,[1] and since then, has sold out every year to date.[2] The event is split between pool parties in the day and headline performances at night, both of which take place in Zrce's open-air venues along the beach. There's also a number of boat parties that sail from Novalja port out onto the Adriatic In 2016, Hideout Festival took place from Sunday 26 June until Thursday 30 June. It was the first year that BBC Radio 1[3] teamed up with the event for a 3-hour broadcast from a live pool party event hosted by Heidi, Monki and B Traits.In 2017 Hideout festival will take place from Monday 26th – Friday 30 June 2017. 5 days and nights, with over 150 artists including MK and Hannah Wants.[4] It is owned and operated by Global.[5]

 

Previous guests have included Seth Troxler, Nina Kraviz, SBTRKT, Ricardo Villalobos, Annie Mac, Skrillex, Four Tet, Andy C, Jamie Jones, DJ EZ, Pendulum, Modeselektor, Disclosure, Rudimental, Solumun, Sasha, Derrick Carter, Gorgon City, Eats Everything, Jamie XX, Hot Since 82 and Hannah Wants. For the 2016 edition, Hideout expanded to include Grime artists on the bill, such as Skepta, Preditah and Stormzy.

 

The lineup for the 2019 festival included MK, Patrick Topping, Camelphat, Alan Fitzpatrick, and Sonny Fodera. It took place from the 1st to 5th of July 2019. [6]

 

References

  1. ^ The best European festivals 2011
  2. ^ [1]
  3. ^ "BBC Radio 1 partners with Croatia's Hideout Festival". www.eventmagazine.co.uk. Retrieved 2016-05-26.
  4. ^ "Hideout Festival 2017 • Zrce Beach, Croatia". Hideout Festival 2017. Retrieved 2016-12-02.
  5. ^ "Hideout Festival Operator • Zrce Beach, Croatia". Global. Retrieved 2017-03-21.
  6. ^ "Hideout Festival Lineup 2019 • Zrce Beach, Croatia". Hideout Festival. Retrieved 2017-03-21.
